fields.description:
ioslib attempts to detect if the iOS Simulator is already running by running {{ps -ef}} and searching for a process with {{-CurrentDeviceUDID}}. However if the iOS Simulator is manually launched from Xcode, the process name won't have the {{-CurrentDeviceUDID}} and ioslib will not detect the simulator is currently running.

ioslib needs to find a better way of determining if the iOS Simulator is running. Perhaps use {{simctl}}?
fields.summary: iOS: Multiple Simulators running at the same time
